members.name: theme
members.documentation: Set theme object. [ThemeType](https://github.com/myxvisual/react-uwp/blob/master/typings/index.d.ts#L43), Usually use [getTheme](https://github.com/myxvisual/react-uwp/blob/master/src/styles/getTheme.ts#L28) function to get it.

members.name: autoSaveTheme
members.documentation: For simple development, autoSaveTheme can read and save theme to `localStorage`. use global context `theme.saveTheme` method to save.

members.name: onGeneratedAcrylic
members.documentation: onGeneratedAcrylic callback, base acrylic textures is base64 url image, for production, you can set this callback, post image to your server, and update theme(use this callback will not auto update theme).

members.name: needGenerateAcrylic
members.documentation: for production if you have generated acrylic textures, you can disabled generation acrylic textures.
